body: mutation {updateproductschedule (productschedule: {id: "0e3652bf-f1d3-4325-840e-c93806289d7e", name:"Testing Name", merchantprovidergroup:"927b4f7c-b0e9-4ddb-a05c-ba81d2d663d3", schedule: [ { product:"83b43636-6594-4fa8-8ab1-a71f2f1b7b1f", start:0, end:30, price:49.00, period:30 }, { product:"83b43636-6594-4fa8-8ab1-a71f2f1b7b1f", start:30, end:90, price:102.00, period: 30 } ] } ) { id, name, created_at, updated_at, merchantprovidergroup{ id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio}, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, schedule { price, start, end, period, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } } } } }
